import React from "react"; const MonthSpendCard = (props) => { if (props.spending === "loading") { return (
); } const name = Object.keys(props.spending.category).map((catKey) => { return
{catKey}
}); const spent = Object.keys(props.spending.category).map((catKey) => { return
{props.spending.category[catKey]}
}); const budget = Object.keys(props.budget).map((cat) => { return
{props.budget[cat].monthly}
}); return (
{props.month}
Category Spent Budget
{name} {spent} {budget}
); } export default MonthSpendCard;
